root.name: .insert()

example.code: letters = ['b', 'c', 'd'] print(letters) # Prints ['b', 'c', 'd'] letters.insert(0, 'a') print(letters) # Prints ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd']

root.description: Insert an item into a list at a given index.

parameter.label: i
parameter.description: The index of the element before which to insert.
